39 MFCarchive::MFCarchive(Carchive& ar) : m_ar(ar) {
40  archive::init();
41  m_bloading = ar.is_loading() ? true : false;
42 }
43 
44 size_t MFCarchive::write(const void *buffer, size_t size, size_t count) {
45  m_ar.write(buffer, size);
46  return size;
47 }
48 
49 size_t MFCarchive::read(void *buffer, size_t size, size_t count) {
50  return m_ar.read(buffer, size);
51 }
